text: Stela Popescu (21 December 1935 – 23 November 2017) was a well-known Romanian actress, humanitarian and television personality. She was born in Orhei. She was known for her roles as Spiona in Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979).Stela Popescu, despre iubirea vieţii ei, Puiu Maximilian: „Decât să moară, mai bine se încurca cu una de 20 de ani şi pleca în lume” Popescu died in Bucharest on 23 November 2017 of a stroke at the age of 81.Stela_Popescu Biografie, Curriculum Vitae Teatrul Revista `C-tin Tanase` si intreaga cariera Her friend, actress Cristina Stamate, died four days later. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Romanian entertainers Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian television actors Category:Television personalities Category:Humanitarians
title: Stela Popescu
